intro: Neuberia rosea, commonly known as the pink-flowered evergreen, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its dense, glossy green foliage. The plant produces clusters of small, pinkish-white flowers that bloom throughout the year. Neuberia rosea is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and adaptability to various growing conditions. It prefers well-drained soil and partial to full sunlight, making it suitable for both indoor and outdoor cultivation.
